IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: UNITED WAY OF CHAMPAIGN COUNTY BRINGS PEOPLE AND RESOURCES TOGETHER TO CREATE POSITIVE CHANGE AND LASTING IMPACT FOR OUR COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: UNITED WAY OF CHAMPAIGN COUNTY BRINGS PEOPLE AND RESOURCES TOGETHER TO CREATE POSITIVE CHANGE AND LASTING IMPACT FOR OUR COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: COMMUNITY IMPACT/COMMUNITY ORGANIZER - MOBILIZING VOLUNTEER RESOURCES, PROVIDING MANAGEMENT ASSISTANCE TO FUNDED PROGRAMS AND PARTICIPATING IN COMMUNITY ORGANIZATIONS TO DEVELOP ALLIANCES AND NETWORKS TO PROMOTE PUBLIC AWARENESS OF NEEDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO PROVIDE A SOURCE OF INCOME FOR THE ORGANIZATION IN RELATION TO ITS CAMPAIGN PROGRAMS.
CHANGE IN FAIR VALUE OF ENDOWMENT PROMISE TO GIVE -30,000.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL FINANCIAL CONTRIBUTORS ARE MEMBERS THAT ARE ENTITLED TO VOTE FOR THE BOARD MEMBERS AT THE ANNUAL MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COPIES OF THE FORM 990 WILL BE DISTRIBUTED VIA EMAIL TO THE BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO ITS FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY PERFORMING AN ANNUAL REVIEW OF THE CODE OF ETHICS POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION FOR EACH EMPLOYEE IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE DURING THE BUDGET DEVELOPMENT PROCESS. COMPENSATION DATA FROM REGIONAL UNITED WAYS ARE USED FOR COMPARISON PURPOSES. THE PROCESS IS DOCUMENTED IN THE COMMMITTEE'S MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE ON WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION. THERE IS A LINK TO GUIDESTAR ON THE UWCC WEBSITE. THE DOCUMENTS ARE ALSO AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW UPON REQUEST DURING OFFICE HOURS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS A LINK ON THE UWCC WEBSITE THAT ALLOWS THE PUBLIC TO REVIEW THE ORGANIZATION'S AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. ALL THE OTHER DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
CHANGE IN FAIR VALUE OF ENDOWMENT PROMISE TO GIVE -30,000.
NO CHANGES HAVE BEEN MADE IN THE PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR
